summary: **Dungeons & Dragons (D&D)** is a popular fantasy game where players create unique characters and go on adventures in a magical world. First made in 1974, it's like a story come to life, with one player, the Dungeon Master, guiding the action. Players earn points to make their characters stronger and can choose special powers. D&D started the role-playing game industry and has had many updates since. It's still very popular today, with millions of players worldwide and lots of fun products like books and adventures to explore.
title: Dungeons & Dragons
